#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 int a,b,c;
 cin>>a>>b>>c;
 int da,dc;
 da=b-a;
 if(da<0)
    da=-da;
 dc=c-b;
 if(dc<0)
    dc=-dc;
 if(da>dc)
 {
    if(da>1)
        cout<<da-1<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"0"<<endl;
 }
 else
    {
        if(dc>1)
        cout<<dc-1<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
}
